attributes.action: Time to destroy ISIS. Send in the Armed Forces to deal with them
attributes.additional_details:
Even the French President says that ISIS have declared war on civilians. http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-34820016

This issue you needs resolving as soon as possible and to prevent more attacks such as this and a repeat of 9/11.

Time to end terrorism as soon as it appears, not when they do something like the latest Paris attacks.
attributes.background:
After the Paris attacks and the extreme threat now posed by ISIS, I call on the government to intervene and destroy ISIS by any means necessary.

This includes putting troops on the ground where ISIS have a presence.
